#include <iostream>
 
using namespace std;
int s(long long int n)
{
    int r,sum=0;
    while(n>0)
    {
        r=n%10;
        if(r%2==0)
        sum=sum+r*2;
        else
        sum=sum+r;
        n=n/10;
    }
    return (sum%10);
}
int main()
{
    long long int t,a,b,i,sum,j;
    int f;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>a>>b;
        sum=0;
        f=0;
        i=a;
        while(1)
        {
            if(i==b)
            {
                f=1;
                sum+=s(i);
                break;
            }
            if(i%10!=0)
            {
            sum+=s(i);
            i++;
            }
            else
            break;
        }
        if(f==0)
        {
        j=b;
        while(1)
        {
            if(j%10!=9)
            {
                sum=sum+s(j);
                j--;
            }
            else
            break;
            if(j<=i)
            break;
        }
        sum=sum+((j-i+1)/10)*45;
        }
        cout<<sum<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
